house_listing.house_description: This 1 level single family home built in 1993 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car attached garage and approximately 2362 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room. Features include view, patio, fireplace, air conditioning, satellite dish.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.view: Mountain View, Panoramic View, Park View

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Nook, Cable TV, Central Vacuum, Foyer, GarageDoor Opener, Horse Property, Landscaped, Laundry Room, Microwave,Pantry, Satellite Dish, Smoke Alarms, Sprinklers, Traditional Style,Trash Compacter, Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s), Workshop
